description:
Season: 18
Original Air Date: 9/09/2005

Dante is unable to forget about his kiss with Brooke. Bridget shows Eric and Brooke her ultrasound of her baby.  In celebration, Bridget invites Brooke and Dante to dinner with her and Nick. Jackie encourages Nick to make things work with Brooke when Bridget comes in. Jackie leaves as Bridget shows Nick the picture from her ultrasound. Later, Nick is shocked to see Brooke and Dante arrive for dinner together.
